SELECT *,pp.product_name as materialName FROM sudn sd
left join md_product_packaging pp on pp.product_no = sd.material and pp.delete_flag = 0
WHERE sd.delete_flag = 0
AND sd.delivery like concat('%', #{delivery}, '%')
AND sd.name_of_ship_to_party like concat('%', #{nameOfShipToParty}, '%')
AND sd.material like concat('%', #{material}, '%')
AND sd.batch like concat('%', #{batch}, '%')
and sd.create_time >= #{startCreateTime} and sd.create_time <= #{endCreateTime} and sd.status = #{status}

SELECT s.* FROM sudn s WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM product_pick p WHERE p.sudn_id = s.id AND p.status = 1 ) and s.status = 1 and s.delete_flag = 0
AND s.delivery like concat('%', #{delivery}, '%')

SELECT s.* FROM sudn s WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM product_pick p WHERE p.sudn_id = s.id AND p.status = 1 ) and s.status = 1 and s.delete_flag = 0
AND s.delivery like concat('%', #{delivery}, '%')

SELECT s.* FROM sudn s WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 and s.delivery_quantity>s.ship_quantity
AND s.delivery like concat('%', #{delivery}, '%')
order by s.delivery,s.item

SELECT s.* FROM sudn s WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 and s.ship_quantity>=s.delivery_quantity
AND s.delivery like concat('%', #{delivery}, '%')
order by s.delivery,s.item
